def_cn: (自然资源)可持续的，不破坏环境的
def_en: You use sustainable to describe the use of natural resources when this use is kept at a steady level that is not likely to damage the environment.

def_cn: (计划、方法、体制)可持续的，持续性的
def_en: A sustainable plan, method, or system is designed to continue at the same rate or level of activity without any problems.
